Is a functional household toilet available? ask permission to observe the facility.
Is there presence of feaces, urine or soiled cleaning material in or around the toilet?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: No toilet observed|Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: What kind of toilet facility do members of your household usually use?
If ‘Flush’ or ‘Pour flush’, also ask: Where does it flush to?
Does the superstructure of the latrine provide privacy?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Flush / pour flush|Pit latrine with slab|Twin pit with slab|Container based sanitation

questions.text: Is the latrine fly-proof (prevent flies from reaching excreta in the pit)?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Pit latrine with slab|Pit latrine without slab / Open pit|Twin pit with slab|Twin pit without slab

questions.text: Is the latrine made from durable materials, or approved resilient local materials
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Pit latrine with slab|Twin pit with slab

questions.text: Is the toilet pit made from durable or resilient local materials (unstable soils), or unlined (stable soils)
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Pit latrine with slab|Pit latrine without slab / Open pit|Twin pit with slab|Twin pit without slab

questions.text: Do you share this facility with others who are not members of your household?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: Approximately how many people use the toilet facility?
Where is this toilet facility located?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: Does your sanitation facility leak or overflow wastes at any time of year?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: Has your pit latrine or septic tank ever been emptied?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: The last time it was emptied, who emptied it?
The last time it was emptied, where were the contents emptied to?
Is everyone in the household able to access and use the toilet at all times of the day and night?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: What was the (main) reason that household members were unable to use the toilet at all times of the day or night?
The last time the child/chidren (0-5years) passed stools, where did they defecate?
The last time the child/chidren (0-5years) passed stools, where did you dispose of the feaces?
Are washable cloths cleaned in a safe place and disposable diapers safely disposed?
May I take a photo of your toilet facility?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Toilet with inadequate privacy|Toilet not functional (Collapsed, full, abandoned)|Functional toilet with privacy

questions.text: Take a photo of the toilet facility
When do your household member wash their hands?
Is there availability of a hand washing facility?
Can you please show me where members of your household most often wash their hands?
Where is/are the hand washing facilities located?
Is there a durable handwashing facility with piped water or water storage, in a fixed and appropriate location

questions.tip:
Verify by checking the tap/pump, or
basin, bucket, water container or similar
objects for presence of water.
questions.text: Observe availability of water at the place for handwashing
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Fixed facility observed (sink/tap) In dwelling|Fixed facility observed (sink/tap)  In yard/plot|Mobile object observed (bucket/jug/kettle)

questions.text: Does the water have minimal handling or hands-free operation of the handwashing facility
Is the water collected and drained from the hand washing facility into a safe disposal point?
Observe availability of soap or detergent at the place for handwashing
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Fixed facility observed (sink/tap) In dwelling|Fixed facility observed (sink/tap)  In yard/plot|Mobile object observed (bucket/jug/kettle)

questions.text: When do you wash your children's faces?
May I take a photo of the handwashing station?
questions.dependentQuestionAnswer: Fixed facility observed (sink/tap) In dwelling|Fixed facility observed (sink/tap)  In yard/plot|Mobile object observed (bucket/jug/kettle)

questions.text: Any general comments / concerns during the data collection?

questionOptions.text: Shared with 10-15 people (or less) including other households
Shared with more than 15 people including other households
I dont know where the emptier took the sludge
Open ground, water body or elsewhere
Toilet is not always safe for all household members to use
Limited mobility prevents members from using the toilet
Distance/barriers prevent members from reaching the toilet
Toilet is not always available to all household members
Before, during, and after preparing food
After handling animals (before and after milking, after contacts with animals, animal products or animal wastes)
Before and after caring for someone at home who is sick with vomiting or diarrhea.
After changing diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet
After washing and disposal of a used diaper
Every moring and every day before bed
Disposed of within household yard or plot
Disposed of in designated waste disposal area
Disposed directly to open ground or water body
N/A (cooking, laundry and bathing is done away from the household)
Sink/drain connected to open drain or open ground
